ModDescription.blacklist: No blacklist members yet. The community is healthy!
ModDescription.Description:
Survivalcraft Wilderness Tech Mod was founded in October 2023, underwent four revisions, and finally settled into its current form.
The Wilderness Tech Mod always focuses on primitive evolution. Players play as a castaway exiled to a deserted island by pirates, starting from scratch as primitive humans to survive.

The mod features rich materials, equipment, weapons, and tools, along with sprinting and thirst mechanics. Survive on this deserted island!
ModDescription.thanks:

ModVersion.0.0.5Description:
Wilderness Tech v0.0.5 Update Notes
1. Mod announcement button re-enabled!
2. Added some test items
3. Adapted for new API 1.8.1.2
4. Removed redundant files, reduced package size (3MBâ†’1MB)
5. Changed some vanilla recipes
6. Fixed main menu mod button not clickable
7. Fixed attribute button position anomaly
8. Fixed mod interface corner radius issue
9. Fixed clay smelting texture not displaying
10. Added credits, description, and download link
11. From v0.0.5 onwards, update logs will no longer be categorized as additions/fixes
ModVersion.bk:
Sorted chronologically, showing only recent updates
Older update records lost

StoneAxeBlock:0.Description:
A relatively sharp stone tool.
Belongs to the Neolithic era.

IronOreChunkBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Put a pile of grains together?

MalachiteChunkBlock:0.CRDescription:1: Put a pile of grains together?

FlintBlock:0.Description: A type of uneven gravel that is relatively sharp, but requires processing before use.

silverIngotBlock:0.Description: Hey! A silver ingot, looks delicious (crossed out) useful. Should be able to craft tools, weapons, and armor! But combining with other ingots... might make it even more powerful!

goldIngotBlock:0.Description:
Wow! Glory days!
A large chunk of glittering gold, must have been difficult to mine!

copper_plateBlock:0.Description:
Flat plate, good flat plate
Copper plate item description

gold_plateBlock:0.Description:
Flat plate, good flat plate
Silver plate item description

silver_plateBlock:0.Description:
Flat plate, good flat plate
Gold plate item description

gold_powder1Block:0.Description:
Ah!!! Don't float away~
Metal powder obtained by crushing ores

copper_powderBlock:0.Description:
Ah!!! Don't float away~
Metal powder obtained by crushing ores

iron_powderBlock:0.Description:
Ah!!! Don't float away~
Metal powder obtained by crushing ores

crucibleBlock:0.Description: Weird dry goods... Where are my crucible tongs?!

crucible1Block:0.Description:
Wow~ Very interesting, be careful not to get burned
Can be used to cast ingots (Related item: Mold)

CopperAxe1Block:0.Description: Copper axe head description (Combine with stick, rope, etc. to make complete copper axe, same below)

silver_nuggetBlock:0.Description: A solid block of pure silver. Very heavy and durable. Extremely resistant to mining and explosions. Can be crafted from multiple silver ingots.

gold_nuggetBlock:0.Description: A solid block of pure gold, soft in texture. Very heavy and durable. Not very resistant to mining and explosions. Can be crafted from multiple gold ingots.

plant_fiberBlock:0.Description: Plant fiber is a soft material that can be used to make rope or cloth

hemp_ropeBlock:0.Description:
Hemp rope is stronger than grass rope and can be used for more advanced tool crafting


[Will be categorized separately from other ropes in the future, for now it stays like this].

barkBlock:0.Description:
Bark is a processed material and also a waste product....

If you don't mind, it can be used as fuel.

straw_ropeBlock:0.Description:
Grass rope is a basic binding material made from plant fibers

Should be usable to craft more items.

Wood1Block:0.Description:
Common and easy to obtain, relatively soft texture.
Suitable for beginners to craft basic tools and simple buildings.

drill_wood_make_fireBlock:0.Description:
Fire drilling is an ancient effective method of making fire

If you have no other ignition methods, fire drilling might be your best choice.

branchesBlock:0.Description:
Branches are commonly obtained, also drop from leaves

Can be processed into sticks.

flint_hammerBlock:0.Description:
Sharp stone hammer is a striking tool used to process other stone tools, such as flaking or repairing tool edges.

Also made from sharp stone flakes, this hammer's design allows it to concentrate force for effective striking and shaping of other stones.

The use of sharp stone hammer demonstrates ancient understanding and utilization of material properties, as well as mastery of tool-making technology.

Still in the Paleolithic era.

Flint_processing_tableBlock:0.Description:
Flint processing table is an early-stage processing workbench, mainly used for handling basic materials like wood.

It uses flint's hardness to cut and grind wood into finer shapes, such as making sticks, planks, or simple wooden tools.

Flint processing table is very practical in early game, helping players quickly prepare basic materials for subsequent crafting and exploration.


Thanks to grassland for providing the computer for debugging

working_pilesBlock:0.Description:
Work stump is a basic crafting station that can be used to craft various simple items like sticks, stone axes, stone pickaxes, etc.

It helps you craft tools and weapons, a very important workbench in early game.

adhesiveBlock:0.Description: A sticky substance that can quickly bond items together, suitable for various materials.

Leather_clothBlock:0.Description: A soft and tough material made from leather, combining leather's durability with fabric's flexibility, a basic material for crafting equipment and items.

Flint_knifeBlock:0.Description: A weapon crafted from sharp stone flakes, high attack power but low durability.

leather_knifeBlock:0.Description:
A weapon crafted from sharp stone flakes, high attack power but low durability.

Added leather grip on the original basis, making it easier to hit targets.

big_boneBlock:0.Description: Bones from animals, very sturdy, perhaps can be processed into tools with higher durability.

boneBlock:0.Description: Bones from animals, very sturdy, perhaps can be processed into tools with higher durability.

cokeBlock:0.Description: Wood burned into charcoal, can be used as fuel, but less effective than coal.

wasteBlock:0.Description: Unnecessary parts from crafting materials, perhaps can be recycled.

templateBlock:0.Description: Basic mold made from clay and dirt, can be pressed into various shapes.

pick_moldBlock:0.Description: Press it to shape it into various forms.

ingot_moldBlock:0.Description: Press it to shape it into various forms.

slab_moldBlock:0.Description: Press it to shape it into various forms.

axe_moldBlock:0.Description: Press it to shape it into various forms.

bone_pickBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

bone_MacheteBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

bone_ShovelBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

bone_AxeBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

bone_SpearBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

bone_hammerBlock:0.Description: Tool crafted from polished bones, efficiency equivalent to entering the Copper Age.

sideroblastsBlock:0.Description: Iron fragments, can be fused into blocks after smelting.

copper_particlesBlock:0.Description: Copper fragments, can be fused into blocks after smelting.

malletBlock:0.Description: Hammer, high damage but expensive crafting materials.

iron_hammerBlock:0.Description: Hammer, high damage but expensive crafting materials.

copper_hammerBlock:0.Description: Hammer, high damage but expensive crafting materials.

bodyBlock:0.Description: Animal carcass, can be decomposed to obtain rich materials.

working_piles1Block:0.Description: Work board, relatively delicate, can serve as the desktop for a crafting table.

working_piles2Block:0.Description: Work stump, can serve as the base for a crafting table.

emBlock:0.Description: Rhino skull, supreme honor, congratulations on defeating the strongest creature in vanilla!

furBlock:0.Description: Animal fur, obtained from decomposing carcasses, can be processed into leather.

CupBlock:0.Description: A wooden cup crafted from planks, can hold water.

firewoodBlock:0.Description:
Wood bundled with rope, burns longer than coal

Unfortunately the burning temperature doesn't meet requirements, so it cannot be used to melt ores.

sharp_stickBlock:0.Description: Sharpened stick, can be used for fire drilling!

ClothingBlock:38.Description: Wooden armor reinforced with planks and rope. Provides some protection. Can keep you slightly warm.

ClothingBlock:39.Description: Leg armor reinforced with planks and rope. Provides some protection. Can provide slight heat insulation.
ClothingBlock:39.CRDescription:0: Bind sticks and planks together for reinforcement
